name: WhatPoll?
tag_list: twitter-application, polls, social-polls, blog-polls, top-10-lists, social-rating
overview:
WhatPoll is a place for the endless amount of photographs, videos, literature, and opinions on the internet to be rated and discussed in one place by the community. All of the content and topics of discussion are user generated and are facilitated by the hybrid blog/polling structure which exists as a platform to promote intense debate, niche social networking, and encourage the best content to get to the top. Topics of discussion range from the bizarre and funny, to serious current affairs.

Users are rewarded for the submission of good content with a kudos system that increases their rank status in accordance with the amount of positive votes received. WhatPoll is also linked into social networks such as Twitter which updates the userâ€™s friends with their activities on the site.
